name: tavern-tales-adventures-wfrp
title: Tavern Tales WFRP4e Adventures
description: This module provides a transformation of Tavern Tales - Blood Baptism from D&D5e to WFRP4e. Tavern Tales is a collection of one-shot adventures for the 5th edition game system from Tavern Tales, who create high-quality adventures with gorgeous battlemaps made available every month. Converted by Vindico#9012 for WFRP4e.
author: Tavern Tales produced by KingSillyGoose#1901 (Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/taverntalesmaps). Adapted for WFRP4e by Vindico#9013
